channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 50mph speed traffic signs along A436 between Withington north road and Seven Springs roundabout are obscured by mud/dirt, 27th March
item.description:
There wasn't a dropdown option for this, but I have noticed that all the speed traffic signs (50mph) along the A436 between the Withington north road and Seven Springs roundabout are very dirty and difficult to read. The sign I have tried to flag on the map near the entrance to Pegglesworth is almost totally obscured by mud. As there are so many accidents along this road I believe the road signs should be cleaned as a matter of urgency. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign has been vandalised (Non illuminating sign)
